job_tasks.phrase: ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems we've built
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to building and maintaining robust software systems, which falls under the umbrella of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: integration of our centralized AI platform into the rest of the CM.com product portfolio
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of connecting and embedding AI capabilities into existing software products, a core software development task.
This indicates involvement with the underlying systems that support AI models, and specifically mentions 'traditional AI models' which points to modeling activities.
The explicit mention of 'generative AI models' points to work involving these types of models, fitting the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: quality assurance functionality that provide fine grained control over the generative AI models
job_tasks.justification: This describes tasks related to controlling and fine-tuning generative AI models, which is a modeling activity.

job_tasks.phrase: systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure
job_tasks.justification: This phrase refers to the infrastructure and systems supporting LLMs, which aligns with operations and maintenance of AI systems.

job_tasks.phrase: upload and manage data sources within their domain
job_tasks.justification: This indicates tasks related to handling and managing data, which is a key aspect of data engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems
provide fine grained control over the generative AI models

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes integration and management of systems around LLMs and generative AI models. While it mentions traditional AI models and data management, the core focus on generative AI, LLM infrastructure, and fine-grained control aligns strongly with the 'GenAI Engineer' profile.
